name: Haendlerbund API
author: nvii-media GmbH

sections.description:
Seamlessly retrieve legal texts from your Händlerbund account. Simply enter your Händlerbund Access Token to access and manage your legal documents. You can choose to display them on specific pages, use shortcodes, or copy the text directly to your clipboard. An integrated cron job feature ensures your shortcode texts stay up to date.
API privacy: https://www.haendlerbund.de/de/datenschutzerklaerung
API documentation: https://www.haendlerbund.de/hubfs/dokumentation-agb-schnittstelle.pdf

short_description: API Connector to Händlerbund HB legal - to get legal text from your account
description:
Seamlessly retrieve legal texts from your Händlerbund account. Simply enter your Händlerbund Access Token to access and manage your legal documents. You can choose to display them on specific pages, use shortcodes, or copy the text directly to your clipboard. An integrated cron job feature ensures your shortcode texts stay up to date.
